name: Illusionary Revenger, Mordred Phantom
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When your "Blaster Dark" is placed on (RC), you get an Imaginary Gift: Force.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Stand] all of your "Blaster Dark", and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Nullity Revenger, Masquerade
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Illusionary Revenger, Mordred Phantom" or "Blaster Dark" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, retire one of your rear-guards.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle it attacked a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: Samurai Chieftain, HYU-GA
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with the same grade as any of your opponent's units, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and until end of turn, change the card name of all of your and your opponent’s units to this unit’s card name.
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], and return all of your opponent's rear-guards with the same card name as your or your opponent's other unit to the deck and shuffle it.

name: Demonic Deep Phantasm Emperor, Brufas
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at all of the cards in your deck, search for up to three cards with the same card name from among them and reveal them, and if your soul has a card with the same card name as those cards, put one of the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your soul. Shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if your soul has two or more grade 3 cards, choose one of your or your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets that unit's [Power] and [Critical] until end of that battle. (Includes increased values)

name: Silver Thorn Dragon Tamer, Luquier
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you called two or more cards from your soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Discard a card from your hand], call any number of cards with "Silver Thorn" in their card names from your soul to (RC), and all of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Danger-lunge Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and return a grade 2 card from your drop zone to hand.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, if you have three or more force markers, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand.

name: Transient Revenger, Masquerade
effect:
[ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul], call a "Blaster Dark" from your drop zone to (RC), and that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[CONT](RC):During the battle it boosted, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: Covert Demonic Dragon, Hyakki Vogue
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to one "Covert Demonic Dragon, Hyakki Vogue", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you have five or more units, all of your units with the same card name as this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Beast, Spell Hound
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one "Stealth Beast, Spell Hound", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. Increase or decrease that unit's and this unit's [Power] to match your vanguard's [Power] until end of turn. (Match the [Power] at that time)

name: Emblem Master
effect:
[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your soul has seven or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck and drop zone for up to a total of three cards with the same card name as one of your units and put them into your soul. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.

name: Yellow Bolt
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a grade 2 or greater, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, you may [Soul-Charge 2]. If you [Soul-Charge] one or more trigger units, draw a card.

name: Silver Thorn Marionette, Lilian
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with "Silver Thorn" in its card name, put it into your soul, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if your soul has four or more cards with "Silver Thorn" in their different card names, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Silver Thorn Assistant, Irina
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, look at two cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your soul, and put one card from among them on the bottom of your deck.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, look at three cards from the top of your deck, put any number of cards with "Silver Thorn" in their card names from among them into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you put two or more cards into your soul, draw a card.

name: Barrier Troop Revenger, Dorint
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If "Frontline Revenger, Claudas" is on your (VC) or (RC), draw a card.

name: Wily Revenger, Mana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, retires it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Frontline Revenger, Claudas
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if your vanguard is grade 3, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], and draw a card. If "Barrier Troop Revenger, Dorint" is on your (VC) or (RC), [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Central Arrester
effect: [CONT](RC):If it is in the back row of the middle column, this unit can attack the vanguard from the back row, and if you have a vanguard with "Dueling Dragon" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of your other units with "Arrester" in their card names.

name: Special Stealth Beast, Weasel Red
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], discard any number of cards from your hand, search your deck for up to the same number of cards with "Special" in their card names as the number of cards discarded from your hand, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Stealth Rogue of Summoning, Jiraiya
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Number of Terror
effect:
[AUTO](RC)/(GC):When placed, if your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][put one of your other rear-guards into your soul], and draw 2 cards.

name: Hope on Damp
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if your soul has twenty or more cards, until end of turn, when your opponent would call from hand to (GC), he or she must call cards with total original [Shield] 20000 at the same time.

name: Wertiger Jaeger
effect:
[AUTO]:When retired from (RC) or (GC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and put this card into your soul.
[AUTO](Soul):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired by your card's effect, [COST][bind this card], and draw a card.

name: Nightmare Doll, Carroll
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at five cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your soul, and shuffle your deck. If you put a grade 3 <Workeroid>, you may call that card to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When your grade 3 rear-guard is put into your soul, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard two cards from your hand], ride a <Workeroid> from your soul as [Stand], and that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Miracle Pop, Eva
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from soul, if your vanguard is grade 3, draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1].
[AUTO]:When rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Silver Thorn, Breathing Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted, if your soul has four or more cards with "Silver Thorn" in their different card names, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put one rear-guard with "Silver Thorn" in its card name that this unit boosted into your soul], and call a card with "Silver Thorn" in its card name from your soul to (RC).

name: Knight of Severity, Dubdrenn

effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard and did not hit, if no guardians were called for that battle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and deal one damage to your opponent's vanguard.

name: Special Stealth Beast, Weasel Yellow
